name: Easy Summer Salad with Roasted Veggies
description: This Easy Summer Pasta Salad with Grilled Vegetables will be your new go-to for all potlucks and picnics! Perfectly cooked pasta, juicy tomatoes, smoky-sweet grilled veggies, and protein-rich chickpeas all tossed in a quick Italian dressing!  The perfect make-ahead bbq side dish or weeknight dinner. Nutfree, Soy-free easily made Gluten-free
recipeIngredient: 8 ounces mini farfalle pasta or any other similar flat pasta
1 cup chopped tomatoes or sliced cherry tomatoes
15 ounce can of chickpeas  (or 1 1/4 cup of cooked chickpeas)
1/2 cup chopped basil or use mint

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the pasta according to instructions then rinse in cold water and set aside. Don't overcook it!
recipeInstructions.name: Cook the pasta according to instructions then rinse in cold water and set aside. Don't overcook it!

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the tomatoes. Slice the zucchini slightly diagonally for grilling. Slice your bell peppers into 1/4 inch thick slices.
recipeInstructions.name: Chop the tomatoes. Slice the zucchini slightly diagonally for grilling. Slice your bell peppers into 1/4 inch thick slices.

recipeInstructions.text: Slice the onion into a half-inch wedge and either use a skewer or a toothpick to hold them together.
recipeInstructions.name: Slice the onion into a half-inch wedge and either use a skewer or a toothpick to hold them together.

recipeInstructions.text: Then brush a grill pan with oil and place the zucchini, peppers, and onion on the grill pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Then brush a grill pan with oil and place the zucchini, peppers, and onion on the grill pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Brush the zucchini, peppers, and onion on top with oil. Add a dash of salt and pepper.
recipeInstructions.name: Brush the zucchini, peppers, and onion on top with oil. Add a dash of salt and pepper.

recipeInstructions.text: Grill over medium-high heat until you get good grill marks of both sides then set aside. Keep pressing the veggies occasionally. Remove toothpicks/skewers when done
recipeInstructions.name: Grill over medium-high heat until you get good grill marks of both sides then set aside. Keep pressing the veggies occasionally. Remove toothpicks/skewers when done

recipeInstructions.text: To make the dressing, combine everything in a bowl and mix well until evenly mixed.
recipeInstructions.name: To make the dressing, combine everything in a bowl and mix well until evenly mixed.

recipeInstructions.text: Add all the salad ingredients to a large bowl - pasta, tomatoes, grilled zucchini, grilled bell peppers, grilled onions, chickpeas , basil and toss well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add all the salad ingredients to a large bowl - pasta, tomatoes, grilled zucchini, grilled bell peppers, grilled onions, chickpeas , basil and toss well.

recipeInstructions.text: Then add the dressing and toss well. Taste and adjust flavor and serve immediately.
